FuncDef: This command configures the Segment Routing mapping server database in OSPF.
CLIs: sid-map node-sid index <index-value> [ range <range-value> ] prefix <ip-address/mask> [ <netmask> ] scope { area <area-id> | as }

ParaDef.Info: The IP address in dotted decimal notation. Values-ip-address/mask:.
Specifies the netmask. Values-netmask - a.b.c.d (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).
configures the mapping server own flooding scope for the generated OSPF Extended Prefix Range TLV. Values-ip-address | 0 to 4294967295.
